value.title: Inception & Project Initiation
value.purpose: Kick off the project by clarifying the problem, scope, stakeholders, and feasibility.

bullets.label: Problem Definition
bullets.text: Clearly articulate the business problem or opportunity.

bullets.label: Stakeholder Identification & Mapping
bullets.text: Identify all stakeholders (users, sponsors, regulators, etc.) and their influence/interest levels.

bullets.label: Project Charter Creation
bullets.text: Define project objectives, scope, constraints, and success criteria.

bullets.label: Feasibility Assessment
bullets.text: Evaluate technical, economic, operational, and schedule feasibility.

bullets.label: Risk Identification
bullets.text: Identify potential project risks and mitigation strategies.

bullets.label: Business Case Development
bullets.text: Justify the project from a business perspective.

acceptance_criteria: Charter signed off with scope & success metrics
Feasibility risks documented with next steps
Initial risk register created and owners assigned
